title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Cowboys Final Play Implosion and McCarthy Future with Matt Mosley, Dave Wannstedt on Dolphins, Bears HC Openings
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Cowboys Final Play Implosion and McCarthy Future with Matt Mosley, Dave Wannstedt on Dolphins, Bears HC Openings
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, it's top takes of the week (3:00), including how Mike McCarthy and the Cowboys "jumped the shark" with that bonehead final play, and why the NBA continues to get lapped by the NFL. Then, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley joined from AT&T Stadium to discuss Dak's misguided final play QB draw (11:00), and if Jerry Jones should move on from Mike McCarthy (15:00). Former Bears & Dolphins HC and Cowboys DC Dave Wannstedt discusses the shocking Brian Flores firing (21:00), his pick for the next Bears head coach (26:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if he's a sharp or square with his 49ers/Packers and Bills/Chiefs (31:00) Divisional Round picks. 

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
